reviews:
This perfume is very strong, so spray lightly and step into it.
It absolutely smells like traditional shampoo, clean, and fresh out of the shower.

This is the yummiest a clean smell can get in my opinion. Call me crazy but it's the perfect "day 3 hair" perfume in my opinion.. Long haired ladies I know you know that feeling, dry shampoo or not, your hair looks good but you need an extra boost to feel super fresh?
No?!
Yeah nevermind.. me neither I just like the smell.
